scripts.dev: npm run build -w @bbb/shared && concurrently "npm run dev -w @bbb/api" "npm run dev -w @bbb/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @bbb/shared && npm run build -w @bbb/api && npm run build -w @bbb/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @bbb/shared && npm run lint -w @bbb/api && npm run lint -w @bbb/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w @bbb/shared && npm run typecheck -w @bbb/shared && npm run typecheck -w @bbb/api && npm run typecheck -w @bbb/web
scripts.test: npm run build -w @bbb/shared && npm run test -w @bbb/shared && npm run test -w @bbb/api && npm run test -w @bbb/web
